content.html: OK, this is going to sound like one of those awful Chat Magazine Top Tips… My home office has laminate flooring & it is cold. I've taken a toilet mat & put it under my desk! Now my feet stay warm and my chair doesn't get caught on the carpet. What's your top home-office hack?
content.value:
OK, this is going to sound like one of those awful Chat Magazine Top Tips…

My home office has laminate flooring & it is cold.

I've taken a toilet mat & put it under my desk! Now my feet stay warm and my chair doesn't get caught on the carpet.

What's your top home-office hack?

photo.alt: A small desk. Underneath it is a U shaped bit of carpet mat.
